title: Loving Hut Siska - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Part of the international vegan fast food chain, this is a food trailer that parks near the Mercator Hypermarket and Kalcek store. Offers a daily lunch that includes soup, main dish, salad, and dessert. Also a la carte dishes made in a wok.
